title: Update No-modal copy and replace angry cat with cute angry panda

requirements.text: In the "LastChanceNoModal" component, remove the user-facing line "That cat is giving you the side-eye right now..." from the modal description so it no longer appears anywhere in the popup UI.

quotes:
Remove this line

That cat is giving you the side-eye right now...

acceptanceCriteria: When the No modal is opened, the text "That cat is giving you the side-eye right now..." is not present in the DOM or visible UI.
No extra blank spacing/empty paragraph is left where the removed line used to be.

requirements.text: Replace the angry cat in the No modal with a cute little angry panda by updating the modal image to use a new panda asset and updating any related user-facing text/alt text so it no longer refers to a cat.

quotes: replace cat with cute little angry panda

acceptanceCriteria: The No modal image is loaded from a panda asset under /assets/generated/ and no longer references /assets/generated/angry-sideeye-cat.dim_768x768.png.
The image alt text (and any other user-facing references in the modal) refers to a panda, not a cat.
The modal still renders correctly (image sizing/spacing preserved) and the primary/secondary buttons continue to function as before.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components only).
Keep the backend as-is; no backend changes are required for this UI-only update.
nonGoals: Changing the overall Valentine proposal flow, evasive No button behavior, or any other copy outside the No modal.
Adding new backend logic or persistence.

required: Cute little angry panda giving a side-eye look, clean illustration style, transparent background (angry-sideeye-panda.dim_768x768.png)
